caption: Table 1: Our Contribution vs the Existing Results in the K-armed MNL-Assortment literature
description: This table compares the regret bounds achieved by the proposed algorithm (Our Alg 1) with those of existing state-of-the-art algorithms for the K-armed MNL-Assortment problem. The comparison highlights the improvement in regret bounds obtained by the proposed algorithm, especially in scenarios where the assumption of θ₀ = θₘₐₓ = 1 does not hold.  The table also shows the different assumptions made by each algorithm and their corresponding regret guarantees.
